item.description:
Join us for a lively evening with John Philopena, Prepress Systems Manager for R.R. Donnelley.

Topic: Technology and the evolving roles in print production.

With nearly two decades of experience in digital prepress production for commercial print, John will be speaking about how technology has changed the graphic design industry. John is also an instructor and trainer in Adobe InDesign and Adobe Acrobat with a focus on streamlining the print production process.

RSVP requested.
item.name: Greater New Haven Design and Marketing October Meetup
